kimononet.net.beacon

Class BeaconService

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • kimononet.net.beacon.BeaconService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Service

    public class BeaconService
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Service
    Service for sending and receiving beacon packets.
    Version:
    3/18/2012
    Author:
    Zorayr Khalapyan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BeaconService(PeerAgent agent)
      Creates a beacon service associated with the specified peer agent with a default timeout value indicated by DEFAULT_TIMEOUT.
      BeaconService(PeerAgent agent, int timeout)
      Creates a new beacon service associated with the specified peer agent and with a set frequency for sending out beacon packets.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BeaconService

        public BeaconService(PeerAgent agent)
        Creates a beacon service associated with the specified peer agent with a default timeout value indicated by DEFAULT_TIMEOUT.
        Parameters:
        agent - Agent representing the peer associated with the sent beacons.

      • BeaconService

        public BeaconService(PeerAgent agent,
             int timeout)
        Creates a new beacon service associated with the specified peer agent and with a set frequency for sending out beacon packets.
        Parameters:
        agent - Agent representing the peer associated with the sent beacons.
        timeout - This value indicates how long in seconds a beacon service waits for receiving a beacon from a neighbor before sending out its own beacon.
